description: The Nano-Air® Hoody was made to be worn for the entirety of your aerobic, start-stop mountain activities, so you’re never slowed down by changing layers. Warm, stretchy and breathable FullRange® insulation dumps excess heat when you’re working hard and keeps you warm when you’re not.
name: Patagonia Nano-Air Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 1.6-oz 30-denier 100% recycled polyester air-permeable shadow stretch ripstop with a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
